name: Audio Visualizer Pack
description:
Just listen to your music!

Play any audio file or listen to music in your browser. It'll work right away!

Controls

M - To show or hide the list of soundscapes

ESC - To show or hide the settings menu in a soundscape

Settings

The game will create a directory with some default files. They contain the setting data for each soundscape. Files are located here: C:\Users\\AppData\LocalLow\Buttermilch\Audio Visualizer Pack

Use it for what you want

Just credit me! :D

Any ideas?

Any ideas, wishes or bugs? Let me know! 
Maybe I'll add your ideas into the pack.

My Twitter: https://twitter.com/_Buttermilch
